function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Vulnerability of iot data collection system to cyber attacks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate data delivery through web services","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Blockchain and smart contract vulnerabilities could lead to unauthorized access to medical data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data replication and distribution could lead to data loss or unavailability.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective health information exchange and record retrieval could result in delayed patient care.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of validation of user identity","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insecure storage of medical data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsecured transfer of encrypted data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of transmission of contagious diseases through the digital signature validation process","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unauthorized access to sensitive medical data stored on medsc","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to validate the integrity of the encrypted file","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of health data fluidity exposes vulnerability to pandemics like covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insecure storage of sensitive medical data on distributed p2p file storage system.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of openpgp for generating and managing pgp keys for patients’ medical data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 with millions infected from over 185 countries/regions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High mortality rate with over 200,000 deceased from covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unhygienic conditions in wet markets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global circulation of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to accommodate increasing covid-19 cases in hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"54% compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emotional and psychological issues associated with quarantine periods","category":"Social and cultural risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective and unsustainable mitigation strategies in western societies","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerable populations such as the elderly and individuals with comorbidities are at risk of severe impacts from covid-19 due to physical inactivity during quarantine and social isolation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels and increased sedentary time during quarantine and social isolation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on the relationship between quarantine/social isolation and deliberate physical activities within the home environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential increase in stress, depression, and anxiety due to social distancing and quarantine measures.","category":"Social and cultural risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential lack of access to mental health resources and support services for individuals affected by quarantine and related news and media.","category":"Social and cultural risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak impaired individuals’ mental health resulting in anxiety, stress, and depression","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity and limited information about covid-19, media influences, and increased perception of harm to physical, social, and risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to identify chronic effects of exergames","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized exergame
